en.av_arrValsPlaceholder: Type some array values, or click 'run' to use random values
en.av_c3: Highlighted yellow records to the left are always sorted. We begin with the record in position 0 in the sorted portion, and we will be moving the record in position 1 (in blue) to the left until it is sorted.
en.av_c5: Move the blue record to the left until it reaches the correct position.

fi.av_arrValsPlaceholder: Erottele arvot välilyönnillä tai jätä tyhjäksi satunnaislukuja varten
fi.av_c3: FIHighlighted yellow records to the left are always sorted. We begin with the record in position 0 in the sorted portion, and we will be moving the record in position 1 (in blue) to the left until it is sorted.
fi.av_c5: FIMove the blue record to the left until it reaches the correct position.

sv.av_arrValsPlaceholder: Skriv in dina värden eller lämna blankt för att använda slumpmässiga värden
